subject: Soccer
UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Paris St.-Germain held Barcelona to a 2-2 tie after Blaise Matuidi scored with a low shot that wriggled past goalkeeper Victor Valdés.
snippet: Paris St.-Germain held Barcelona to a 2-2 tie after Blaise Matuidi scored with a low shot that wriggled past goalkeeper Victor Valdés.
